title: Osaid1
author: Osaid1
created_time: October 27, 2022, 03:33:53 AMLast edit: October 27, 2022, 11:31:06 PM by Osaid1
content: Hello everyone. For those who are unaware of StakeCubeCoin's (SCC) recent algorithm update and were mining SCC on X11 Algorithm, here is an update for you.Update info (Algorithm switch from X11 to FiroPOWQuoteSCC Core v3.3.x is a major update to the SCC codebase. Implementing features such as a new mining algorithm, adjusted difficulty recursion, and improved RAM usage by the reduction and optimization of caching.SCC Core v3.3.0 is a mandatory update for all services, MN, and block producers.Block 490,000 all old peers will be disconnected from v3.3.0 wallets.ProgPOW(Firopow in mining software) Mining Algorithm goes into effect at 1666350000 which is Friday, October 21, 2022, 11:00:00 AM GMT.Mining Software:https://github.com/firoorg/firominer/releases/tag/1.1.0Latest Release:https://github.com/stakecube/StakeCubeCoin/releases/tag/v3.3.1QuoteThe previous version required some additional configuration to make blocks acceptable to mining pools.SCC Core v3.3.1 is a mandatory patch release for all services, masternodes, and block producers.Current Supporting Pool(s)https://coinminerz.com/pool/StakeCubeCoinhttps://zpool.ca/algo/firopowIf any other Pool wants to add StakeCubeCoin (SCC) Please add your pool at > https://miningpoolstats.stream/stakecubecoin& for those who are totally unaware of "what is" StakecubeCoin please visit >https://stakecube.net/stakecubecoin

comments.author: Osaid1
comments.created_time: October 27, 2022, 11:28:02 PMLast edit: October 28, 2022, 12:46:17 AM by Osaid1
comments.body: Zpool is now also supporting SCC FiroPOW Pool.>>>Official post by Zpool regarding SCC Pool Support on Bitcointalk<<<
